product_name: Seattle Sports Standard Sea Kayak Flotation Set
long_description: The all-purpose Standard Sea Kayak Flotation Set from Seattle Sports offers added buoyancy and water displacement to prevent swamping. Set of 2 utility floats includes one 43 x 15.5 in. bow bag and one 49 x 20 in. stern bag. PVC-coated polyester construction.
short_description: The all-purpose Standard Sea Kayak Flotation Set from Seattle Sports offers added buoyancy and water displacement to prevent swamping.
